job.title: Data Analyst (Growth)
job.description: pstrongAbout Cheetahstrong ppstrongbrstrong ppRestaurants and small businesses account for hundreds of billions of dollars in annual pppurchasing yet most of it happens offline From the humblest NYC slice and a cup of joe to ppmuseumquality lattes and yes avocado toast each order represents a long paper trail and a ppseries of truck deliveries ppbr ppWith a rapidly growing market presence Cheetah is already streamlining the daily workflow of pphundreds of restaurants and small business owners Using Cheetahs services they manage ppmillions of dollars in monthly purchasing while Cheetah eliminates the burden of costly sales ppreps and inflexible inefficient distribution centers Partnering with the largest suppliers in the ppUS Cheetah is bringing the Silicon Valley user experience to an industry that hasnt evolved in ppdecades In the process were helping to reintroduce the small business owner to the small ppfarmer global supply chains to familiar faces and delivery and logistics workers to increased ppmobility and new opportunities ppbr ppAt Cheetah a relentless executive team has set out to change this reality armed with deep ppindustry and entrepreneurial experience personal conviction and 70M in funding from ppEclipse Floodgate and the early backers of Facebook Lyft and Airbnb ppbr ppUnencumbered by the oldschool business models and practices Cheetah has introduced ppunprecedented transparency in pricing and inventory to the SMB marketplace In doing so ppCheetah allows the people who form the backbone of local economies to focus on what they pplove cooking great food and providing excellent service From the convenience of their phones ppbusiness owners can now order whatever they need discover new rare or seasonal specialty ppproducts and prioritize their customers No more rushing to unload your doubleparked van ornbspwaiting anxiously for a truck to show up with your weekly allotment of boxes ppbr ppstrongData Analyst Growthstrong ppstrongbrstrong ppCheetah is looking for a data analyst with experience in market growth and customer ppbehavior analytics This function is vital to the longterm success of the company and ppenables Cheetah to meet the needs of existing customers while also ppidentifyingprioritizing new markets and cuisines In this role you will dive into data ppranging from eventbased app usage to itemlevel order details and extract behavioral pppatterns Youll define core growth KPIs eg retention basket penetration etc and ppset up tools to track them Youll work closely with a range of stakeholders from ppMarketingSales to Procurement to executive management ppbr ppstrongResponsibilitiesstrong ppbr pulliDefine and collect relevant data to perform further analyses on growth opportunities liliApply data and analytic skills to help understand how customers use our products  eg learning how to extract deep interests and tendencies from event streams liliDrive cohort analyses to understand customer behavior and identify opportunities for improving our products customer retention and churn liliWork with the sales team to identify and prioritize customer leads in light of market location and cuisine and work with the supply chain team to ensure we have sufficient inventory for new customers liliWork with the executive team on seeding markets for expansion identifying the key targets  geographies liliCollaborate with data and business intelligence teams to develop reports and visualization dashboards liliBuild financial models to project key business metrics  traffic conversion engagement  and develop KPIs to track performance liulpbr ppstrongQualificationsstrong ppbr pulli3 years of professional experience in business or product analytics or comparable position handling large complex human behavior data sets liliProven track record in solving business problems using datadriven and scientific methods liliExperience using SQL to access and analyze data Strong data visualization and PythonR skills are a plus liliUnderstanding of statistics eg hypothesis testing etc liliStrong speaking writing and presentation skills as well as the ability to persuade inspire and motivate others liliMust have the ability to summarize key insights for both technical and nontechnical audiences liulpbr ppstrongBenefits and Perksstrongbr ppstrongbrstrong pulliFlexible working schedule  location liliCompany happy hours team building events and intramural sports teams liliUnlimited paid time off liliComprehensive medicaldentalvision insurance and commuter benefits lili401k plan and flexible spending benefits liliThe opportunity to work alongside a visionary team during Cheetahs rapid growthliul
